The Progress Developer Expert program comprises an elite group of strong community ambassadors for Progress products. Through a nomination and curation process, DEs the world over provide insight about our products to customers, potential customers, clients and partners, while providing feedback about ways we can best meet the needs of the developer communities that we serve. The program is managed by the Developer Relations team.

Developer Experts Write, Speak, Help, and Code. They produce video, online courses, whitepapers and books on our product blogs, on Medium, or on their personal blogs. They also speak at conferences, meetups, and user groups. Developer Experts also help other users of our products by posting on forums and answering StackOverflow questions. They also build Github repos and contribute code relevant to our products.
